snippet: The alliance cited an effort to limit the size of delegations from partner nations, but Western officials said an internal assessment had found that intelligence agents were part of Russia’s mission.
abstract: North Atlantic Treaty Organization downsizes Russian delegation as punishment for country's incursions into Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: The alliance cited an effort to limit the size of delegations from partner nations, but Western officials said an internal assessment had found that intelligence agents were part of Russia’s mission.

headline.main: NATO Caps Size of Russia’s Mission After Internal Reports of Espionage
headline.print_headline: NATO Caps Size of Russia’s Mission After Internal Reports of Espionage
